about_the_game:
Reclaim the Flame. Restore the Light.
Echoes of Argora is an action RPG, where you step into the role of Azure, a young hero chosen by prophecy to confront an ancient darkness. Explore a large, open world, wield divine powers, and battle through shadows to restore a stolen light to the land.

Argora was once a land of boundless beauty, protected by the Holy Flame—a beacon gifted by the gods. But the darkness has spread, devouring villages, forests, and mountains, and only the chosen one can reclaim the light. Guided by ancient relics, you must seek blessings from gods of light, thunder, justice, and chaos, mastering powers that will grow as you do. Face brutal enemies, uncover Argora’s forgotten myths, and complete trials set by the gods themselves in a story-driven journey that will define the fate of a world.

Vast, Open-World Exploration
Traverse Argora’s landscapes—from mystical forests and towering mountain peaks to eerie, shadowed villages. See landmarks from afar that beckon you closer, each filled with secrets, lore, and breathtaking vistas. Every area is crafted to reward exploration and curiosity.

Master Divine Powers
Unlock and evolve powers granted by gods, including light, thunder, justice, and chaos. Build your skills through a rich progression system that lets you forge your unique path to victory. Watch Azure grow into a hero capable of challenging the darkest foes.

Intense And Fluid Combat
Battle enemies corrupted by shadow in dynamic, fast-paced encounters. Strategically combine divine abilities and weapon skills to dodge, counter, and strike in challenging fights that reward skill and precision.

Trials of the Gods
Prove your worth in mystical trials set by the gods, each one testing your intellect, combat skill, and resolve. Uncover divine relics and solve puzzles to gain blessings needed to reclaim the Holy Flame.

An Epic Tale of Light and Darkness
Dive into a deep narrative inspired by Norse mythology. Discover scrolls, relics, and forgotten myths as you piece together the history of a world that has lost its light. Every choice and discovery brings you closer to reclaiming Argora—or losing it forever.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following mature themes:

Violence and extreme violence:
The game features graphic depictions of violence, including intense combat and explicit scenes that may be disturbing to some players.

Dark themes: The narrative explores themes such as moral corruption, the struggle for survival, and the consequences of extreme violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600 processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
